clue_005a.description: [HIDDEN] Historical records mention 'shadow echoes' - dimensional reflections that appear when reality becomes unstable.
clue_005a.notes: The phenomenon was documented during the Founding Era but thought to be myth.

clue_005b.description: [HIDDEN] Echo has been having blackouts - gaps in memory where time is missing.
clue_005b.notes: Echo hasn't told anyone about this.

clue_005c.description: [HIDDEN] The doppelganger's energy signature matches Echo's but is phase-shifted by 0.7 dimensions.
clue_005c.notes: It's Echo from a parallel dimension bleeding through.

clue_005d.description: [HIDDEN] The solution: The countdown at tick 200 will seal or open the dimensional rift. The choice determines Echo's fate.
clue_005d.notes: Connected to mystery_006. The mysteries are ONE.
